articles.author: COLLEEN BARRY, JAMEY KEATEN
articles.title: Tourists and residents warned to stay inside as deadly heat hits Europe during peak travel season - The Associated Press
articles.description: Officials are warning residents and tourists packing Mediterranean destinations to stay indoors during the hottest hours as the second heat wave in as many weeks hits the region and Greece, Spain and Switzerland battle wildfires. In Italy, civil protection wo…
articles.content: MILAN (AP) Officials warned residents and tourists packing Mediterranean destinations on Tuesday to stay indoors during the hottest hours as the second heat wave in as many weeks hits the region and … [+6793 chars]
